name: Space Traffic Control (Tempest88)
description:
Your job as 'Space traffic control' is to move and isolate passing spaceships in this relaxing stressful game.

**********************************************

Goal: Spaceships are explosively sensitive to each other and must not come near other spaceships for too long otherwise you might see an explosive outcome.

**********************************************

Controls: click and drag on spaceships to move them

**********************************************

Spaceships: 

  • Black: slow and small range but hard to see
  • Blue: fast and small range, hard to grab
  • Red: standard on all sides
  • Orange: very slow but large range, doesn't like to move much
  • Green: Stationary, medium range, doesn't like to move
  • Purple: fast and large range, likes to move a lot

**********************************************

Game made for AI & Games jam 2022
